alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 19 at 8:39PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. For the Buffalo River...including Hawley, Dilworth...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buffalo River near Dilworth. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Gage not accessible above 15 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 7.6 feet and then begin rising this afternoon. It will then rise again to 7.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will fall to 7.5 feet and then begin rising tomorrow evening. It will then rise above flood stage early Thursday morning to 15.1 feet early Saturday morning. It will fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
